actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution amending Rule XXVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit the use of suspension of the rules to bills and resolutions costing less than fifty million dollars in any fiscal year.

summary.text: Amends rule XVIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit the use of suspension of the rules to bills or resolutions with an estimated net cost of $50,000,000 or less for any fiscal year.

titles.title: A resolution amending Rule XXVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit the use of suspension of the rules to bills and resolutions costing less than fifty million dollars in any fiscal year.
